input.sentences: we had a great time this weekend
the fireman showed how to do thier job
there are so many color houses
in the end everyone was happy
output.sentences: The beauty of the countryside I could not deny.
It beckoned me to search until I happened upon some men hard at work.
Their water spray made me think of the bay so had to go to see it.
Then of course mother nature called and I searched an hour for a place of relief.
Stubbing out the door, I hurried across the street and found this cute little creature!
